sqlMap.statement:
SELECT IOD.EZTABLEID , IOD.EZCANCELFLAG , IOD.EZINTIME , IOD.EZINTIMEZONE , IOD.EZINCOMPANYCODE , IOD.EZINUSERID , IOD.EZINAPLID , IOD.EZUPTIME , IOD.EZUPTIMEZONE , IOD.EZUPCOMPANYCODE , IOD.EZUPUSERID , IOD.EZUPAPLID , IOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD , IOD.INVTY_ORD_NUM , IOD.INVTY_ORD_LINE_NUM , IOD.MDSE_CD , IOD.STK_STS_CD , IOD.INVTY_LOC_CD , IOD.LOC_STS_CD , IOD.TO_STK_STS_CD , IOD.ORD_QTY , IOD.DMG_CLM_QTY , IOD.INVTY_ORD_DTL_STS_CD , PRCH_REQ_NUM , PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM , PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM , PRCH_REQ_REC_TP_CD , TRX_REF_SRC_TP_CD , TRX_REF_NUM , TRX_REF_LINE_NUM , TRX_REF_LINE_SUB_NUM , FSR_NUM , FROM_RTL_WH_CD , FROM_RTL_SWH_CD , FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD , TO_RTL_WH_CD , TO_RTL_SWH_CD , TO_INVTY_LOC_CD , ADJ_CATG_CD , ADJ_ACCT_ALIAS_NM , COA_CMPY_CD , COA_BR_CD , COA_ACCT_CD , COA_PROD_CD , COA_CH_CD , COA_CC_CD , COA_AFFL_CD , COA_EXTN_CD , COA_PROJ_CD , INVTY_ORD_LINE_COST_AMT , SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK , RMV_CONFIG_FLG , SHIP_TO_CUST_CD , INVTY_ORD_LINE_CMNT_TXT FROM INVTY_ORD_DTL IOD WHERE IOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IOD.INVTY_ORD_NUM = #invtyOrdNum# AND IOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' FOR UPDATE
NOWAIT
SELECT DILV.RTL_WH_CD , DILV.RTL_SWH_CD FROM DS_INVTY_LOC_V DILV WHERE DILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DILV.INVTY_LOC_CD = #invtyLocCd#
